quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it's bad.
quotes.author: Cory House

quotes.text: hello everyone this is a test quote
quotes.author: Siraj Panigrahi

quotes.text: Term bug derived from an actual insect inside the machine in 1960's
quotes.author: Shruti Jain

quotes.text: விதைத்தவன் உறங்கலாம். ஆனால் விதைகள் ஒருபோதும் உறங்குவதில்லை
quotes.author: Manush

quotes.text: उद्यमेन हि सिध्यन्ति कार्याणि न मनोरथैः।
quotes.author: Atomic

quotes.text: Not all those are lost are lost
quotes.author: Anvesha Shetty

quotes.text: Debugging is twice as hard as writing the code in the first place. Therefore, if you write the code as cleverly as possible, you are, by definition, not smart enough to debug it.
quotes.author: Apoorva Asati

quotes.text: I'm not gonna run away, I never go back on my word! That's my nindo: my ninja way!
quotes.author: Naruto

quotes.text: हर सुबह एक नया अवसर है, बस खुद पर विश्वास रखो.
quotes.author: Unknown
